name: Youmu's Slash-or-Treat! (Unfinished)
description:
Yuyuko has tasked Youmu with greeting spooky holiday visitors, but her head isn't as quick as her blade. Play as Myon and help her sort the trickers from the treaters!

...If the game was finished, that is. Didn't have enough time during the jam, so this is just an incomplete scene for now with some music and art.

Lovely sprites by: DoctorSlump

Groovy music by: Astrum_Remi

Everything else: Vinyis
